name: Go Go Dungeon
description:
Go Go Dungeon is a simple roguelike game. Kill goblins, collect chests, and get the highscore!

Controls:

W, A, S, D to Move

Shift to Run

Space to Slash

E for Bomb

Credits:

Art by https://o-lobster.itch.io/simple-dungeon-crawler-16x16-pixel-pack

Background Music by https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ChbWFvZATFA

Other sounds from various YouTube sources

Maze Generation by https://github.com/dstromberg2/maze-generator

Other programming by me!

Made using:

Phaser 3, Tiled, TypeScript (with future Socket.io)
